short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your YouTube viewing experience with Bookmarker for YouTube™. Save, organize and pick up where you left off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the YouTube Bookmarker & Resumer, you can easily bookmark your favorite videos and resume watching from where you left off, without having to search for the video again. This extension comes with a host of features to enhance your YouTube viewing experience, including adding notes to bookmarks and searching previously added bookmarks. Whether you're a casual YouTube viewer or a dedicated content creator, it is the perfect tool to help you stay organized and never miss a moment of your favorite videos. 

 

Key Features of YouTube Bookmarker  

1.Bookmarking: Store and sort as many videos as wanted to be reviewed at later time.
2. Resuming: Pick up where you left off with progress tracking across sessions.
3. Organized Video Bookmarking: Organize bookmarked videos into folder or tag of choice.
4. Export Bookmarked Videos: Export or retrieve your List of videos that you bookmarked.
5. Timestamped Shareable Links: Add and post clickable links that will only start at the given time.
6. Cross-Device Sync: The other feature is that you can easily sync bookmarks and settings into multiple devices that you own.
7. Add Notes: Add notes to bookmarks to quickly remember the material.


How To Use ?  

◉ Install the extension   
◉Once installed, navigate and open the video you want to save. 
◉Wait for the video to start playing, and then click on the Bookmark icon adjacent to the volume control option  
◉ Click the "Bookmark icon" to add the bookmark to your list.  
◉To access your saved bookmarks, click the extension icon and select the bookmarks you want from the menu. 
◉You can add notes to saved bookmarks or delete them with one click  
◉ To resume watching a video from where you left off, go to your bookmarks list and click on the time stamp. 


Disclaimer: It's important to note that the YouTube Bookmarker browser extension is not associated with YouTube or its parent company, Google. It is an independent third-party tool that provides a bookmarking feature for YouTube videos.
